properties.entry:
select sourceId, destinationId from sct2_relationship r inner join ( select id, max(effectiveTime) effectiveTime from sct2_relationship group by id ) rd on rd.id = r.id and rd.effectiveTime = r.effectiveTime where typeId = 116680003 and active = 1
union
select destinationId, sourceId from sct2_relationship r inner join ( select id, max(effectiveTime) effectiveTime from sct2_relationship group by id ) rd on rd.id = r.id and rd.effectiveTime = r.effectiveTime where typeId = 116680003 and active = 1
